full_summary:
# Request for Proposal for Fiberglass Boat 5.9-7m
## RFP Reference Number: PW-MC-047-29282
### Tender Closing Date: March 6, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

The Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC) is seeking proposals for the supply of a fiberglass boat with dual enclosed consoles and trailer for use in the Migratory Bird Conservation and Protection Program managed by Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC). The required boat shall be of a minimum size of 5.9m and a maximum size of 7m.

**Delivery Location:** The boat must be delivered to Mount Pearl, Newfoundland and Labrador by no later than June 30, 2024.

**Scope of Work:**

* The successful supplier will be responsible for delivering the fiberglass boat with dual enclosed consoles and trailer to the specified location on or before the deadline.
* The boat shall meet the specifications and requirements outlined in Annex A of the Request for Proposal (RFP).

**Trade Agreement:** The Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) applies to this procurement.

**Competition**:
This procurement will be conducted through a selective tendering process. The lowest price bid will be the basis for the award of contract.

**Delivery Date**: The boat must be delivered by June 30, 2024.

**Language of Submission**: Submissions may be made in either official language of Canada (English or French).

**Additional Information:**

* Suppliers are advised that the Crown retains the right to negotiate with suppliers on any procurement.
* Bidders may request a debriefing on the results of the bid solicitation. A debriefing can be requested within fifteen (15) working days from receipt of notification that their bid was unsuccessful.
* Documents can be accessed on the Buyandsell.gc.ca website.

**Contact Information:**

* Martin Rhéaume, Contracting Authority
* Phone: (111) 111-1111
* Email: [martin.rheaume@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:martin.rheaume@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
